moons.name: Phobos
moons.description: Named after the Greek mythical character, son of Ares and responsible for panic and fear.

moons.name: Deimos
moons.description: Named after the Greek mythical character, son of Ares and responsible for terror and dread.

moons.name: Moon
moons.description: The Moon is an astronomical body that orbits planet Earth and is Earth's only permanent natural satellite.
